text.text:
*Now*
If you want to keep the playbooks you've made, you should back them up. (rsync, scp, etc, ask us (soon!) if you need help.)

*Please fill out the survey!*
We need to know what went well or poorly, and <https://forms.gle/8D7VRsutySbu1Fp57|how we can improve this for next year>.

*Do you want a certificate*?
<https://forms.gle/EuQwp8aH6MeGAZ7W9|You can request a certificate attendance for this training week.> You have until July 11 to submit this form, so you can keep working on the tutorials for a bit longer if you wish. For 'URLs to histories', just supply your VM hostname

*This Week*
Are you joining the GCC conference? Come say hi to us in Remo, we'll be around.

*Next Week*
 :put_litter_in_its_place: On friday, all of the VMs will be deleted.
